name: Content Quality Rubric
description: Evaluates written content for clarity, accuracy, engagement, and structure

criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: Is the writing clear and easy to understand? Is the message communicated effectively?

criteria.name: Accuracy
criteria.description: Is the information factually correct and well-researched?

criteria.name: Engagement
criteria.description: Is the content interesting and engaging? Does it hold the reader's attention?

criteria.name: Structure
criteria.description: Is the content well-organized? Does it have a clear beginning, middle, and end?
